settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Dipropylene Glycol, Canola Oil, Centella Asiatica Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Sorbitan Tristearate, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Seed Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf/Stem Extract, Oil Soluble Licorice (Glycyrrhiza) Extract, Adenosine, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Water


Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

As the last step of skin care, lightly apply to dry areas on face or body.


STEP 2

Re-apply whenever, wherever, for 24/7 dryness repair.


WHEN

On dry skin as necessary throughout the day.


GOOD TO KNOW

You can even use this as a lip balm or to create a dewy, natural highlight - just apply to the high points of your cheekbones and dab in for the classic RIMAN glow.

Click Here for Full Set of Steps

settings.text:
1. A concentrated treatment and touch-up balm to nourish your skin on the go.
  2. This balm provides deep moisturization with a glowing finish for parched and dull skin.
  3. Its light texture leaves a barely-there feeling, yet excellent moisture retention.
  4. As the balm melts into the skin, it infuses the skin with hydrating ingredients and vitamins, all the while forming an occlusive barrier to retain that moisture.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
